entry.title: Thursday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Ice pellets or snow mixed with freezing rain beginning early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain changing to rain this evening. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 before morning. Low plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
